title: Chic Duplex Retreat for Creatives in Suburb, Nowy Sacz
description: Discover this stylish, light-filled duplex tailor-made for artistic souls. Offering 4 spacious bedrooms and 3 well-appointed bathrooms across a generous 172 sqm layout, this home effortlessly blends comfort with modern design. A bright open-plan living area features a cozy fireplace, perfect for relaxing evenings or inspiring creative brainstorms. Outside, you’ll enjoy a private fenced yard and a dedicated barbecue zone, creating an oasis for gatherings or quiet contemplation.
neighborhood_description: Set in the laid-back Suburb neighborhood of Nowy Sacz, this property is surrounded by a quietly vibrant artistic community. With a balanced lifestyle at its core, residents embrace both bike rides through leafy streets and a family-friendly environment close to schools. Enjoy the tranquility of the suburbs without losing touch—easy highway access brings you swiftly to the city or countryside whenever inspiration calls.
target_buyer: Ideal for young professionals, artists, or creative families seeking a tranquil base to spark and nurture fresh ideas. Perfect for those who value community and smart living.
market_positioning: Uniquely positioned for creative buyers in search of space, individuality, and quiet, all at a competitive price in one of Nowy Sacz's emerging artistic neighborhoods.
